feed.title: SAP Community - ABAP Development
feed.subtitle: ABAP Development Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Effective way of doing an UPDATE with INNER JOIN in ABAP?
entry.content:
I have this statement in MS Access DB and I need to port it to ABAP:

 

UPDATE tableA
INNER JOIN tableB ON tableA.field1 = tableB.field1
SET tableA.field2 = tableB.field2
WHERE tableA.field2 IS NULL.
 
I can't figure out a "nice" way of doing this in ABAP without making it way more complicated than it should be.

What's your optimized way of doing this?
 
So far, this is what I have:

    DATA: lt_table1 TYPE TABLE OF table1.

    SELECT *
      INTO TABLE @DATA(lt_data)
      FROM table1
      INNER JOIN table2 ON
          table1~field1 = table2~field1
      WHERE table1~field2 IS NOT NULL.

    LOOP AT lt_data ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<fs_data>).
      <fs_data>-table1-short_id = <fs_data>-table2-short_id.
      INSERT <fs_data>-table1 INTO TABLE lt_table1.
    ENDLOOP.

    MODIFY table1 FROM TABLE lt_table1.


NOTE: My version of ABAP is 7.5

entry.title: ABAP trial - docker: connect to DB via CLI
entry.content:
Hi all,

I'm using this docker - https://hub.docker.com/r/sapse/abap-cloud-developer-trial 

SAP is running.

I want to connect to the DB via CLI.

Where can I find credentials to be able to connect?

Thanks

 

@julieplummer20 @ralfheindoerfer

entry.title: TEMSE management - Getting error in Background Job
entry.content:
Hi, 

I am getting error in production server where I have set the scheduled job to emails payment advise to vendor every day. When this job execute manually on immediate then it working fine but schedule job of same custom program is getting below error

Although it is spool request reading error, it mean system is unable to write in spool. I have set parameter

rspo/store_location = G 

and system have 755 permission and enough space to write the file in the /usr/sap/SID/SYS/global/500SPOOL, but every day I need to run this job manually.

Production server configuration is ECC 6 EHP8 version , SUSE OS and Oracle database.

Please provide reason and solution.

 

Regards,

Tayab Shah

entry.title: View's field is empty although it isn't empty in its table
entry.content:
Hi Gurus,

My problem is that I have a SPRAS field in a Z-table with values in it. When I'm displaying the table's fields within a maintenance view, I see that this field is empty, like there's no language. SPRAS is part of the table's key.

Any ideas?

entry.title: automation on convert batch input to bapi
entry.content:
Hello ,

upgrade to s\hana from ecc involve (not mandotery) , overwrite batch-inputs with bapi.

I have an idea and like to check with you , experts , if its a good one ...

The main idea is to convert the bdcdata internal table to the tables used as an input to the bapi .

i'll build a generic function\method with input params: transaction,bdcdata[] .

Using there  z table with mapping of screen\fields from bdcdata to table\field on the bapi input data .

we'll insert the generic function\method instead of command  "call transacrion fb01... using bdcdata" that will convert the bdcdata  to bapi tables and run the bapi instead .

that's the idea. do you find in usefull ? is there other automation instead of rewrite the code in all the  programs involve batch-input?

thanks,

Koby

entry.title: BADI to pick user name from the user ID in COUNT_LIST output form
entry.content:
Hi,

We have a requirement to display the username in the PI count output format rather than the username which is given in the standard form. We have created a custom field, assigned it to the custom layout and tried using the BADI- INV10_LIST_OF_STOCKS_FORM_I. However, we are unable to get the username.

Please advise.

Thanks,

Ruwani

entry.title: Syntactically incompatible change of existing functionality error.
entry.content:
Hi,

In my custom code i am using the below BAPI.
Everything works fine but i get the error message which you can see in the header of the question, in ATC.
I  went through the snotes but didn't help me. (2438131, 2215852 ) 
How can i get over this issue?
Here is the BAPI.

  METHOD /bobf/if_frw_action~execute.
    TYPES: BEGIN OF lty_delivery_all,
             key     TYPE /bobf/conf_key,
             ref_doc TYPE vgbel,
           END OF lty_delivery_all.

    DATA: lt_items_all    TYPE TABLE OF /scmtms/s_tor_item_tr_k,
          lv_action_key   TYPE /bobf/conf_key,
          lt_mod          TYPE /bobf/t_frw_modification,
          ls_mod          TYPE /bobf/s_frw_modification,
          lr_action_par   TYPE REF TO /bobf/s_atf_a_create_file,
          lr_atf_root     TYPE REF TO /bobf/s_atf_root_k,
          ls_parameters   TYPE /bobf/s_atf_a_create_file,
          lt_return       TYPE TABLE OF bapiret1,
          lt_success      TYPE TABLE OF bapivbrksuccess,
          lt_delivery_all TYPE TABLE OF lty_delivery_all,
          lv_pdf          TYPE fpcontent,
          lv_destination  TYPE rfc_dest. 

    CONSTANTS: lc_x           TYPE c                       VALUE 'X',
               lc_c           TYPE c                       VALUE 'C',
               lc_ordbilltyp  TYPE fkara                   VALUE 'Z01',
               lc_ref_doc_ca  TYPE c LENGTH 1              VALUE 'K',
               lc_kschl       TYPE na_kschl                VALUE 'ZMRT',
               lc_name_prefix TYPE c LENGTH 17             VALUE 'Test',
               lc_mime_code   TYPE w3conttype              VALUE 'application/pdf',
               lc_att_type    TYPE /bobf/attachment_type   VALUE 'ATCMT',
               lc_att_schema  TYPE /bobf/attachment_schema VALUE 'DEFAULT'.

    "Get items to be able to reach delivery numbers.
    io_read->retrieve_by_association(
      EXPORTING
        iv_node        = /scmtms/if_tor_c=>sc_node-root
        it_key         = it_key
        iv_association = /scmtms/if_tor_c=>sc_association-root-item_tr
        iv_fill_data   = abap_true
      IMPORTING
        et_data        = lt_items_all ).

    "Prepare delivery table for all FOs.
    LOOP AT lt_items_all ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<ls_item>) WHERE base_btd_id IS NOT INITIAL AND base_btd_tco = '73'.
      APPEND INITIAL LINE TO lt_delivery_all ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<ls_delivery_all>).

      <ls_delivery_all>-key = <ls_item>-parent_key.
      SHIFT <ls_item>-base_btd_id LEFT DELETING LEADING '0'.
      <ls_delivery_all>-ref_doc = |{ <ls_item>-base_btd_id  ALPHA = IN }|.
    ENDLOOP.

    "Prepare data to be able to check if invoice generation should be blocked or not.
    IF lt_delivery_all IS NOT INITIAL.
      SELECT tknum,tpnum,vbeln
        FROM vttp INTO TABLE @DATA(lt_vttp)
        FOR ALL ENTRIES IN @LT_delivery_all
        WHERE vbeln = @LT_delivery_all-ref_doc.

      IF sy-subrc = 0 AND  lt_vttp IS NOT INITIAL.
        SELECT vbeln,faksk,lifsk,spstg
          FROM likp INTO TABLE @DATA(lt_likp)
          FOR ALL ENTRIES IN @LT_vttp
          WHERE vbeln = @LT_vttp-vbeln.

        IF sy-subrc = 0 AND lt_likp IS NOT INITIAL.
          SELECT vbeln,posnr,faksp,vgbel,vgpos,vgtyp
            FROM lips INTO TABLE @DATA(lt_lips)
            FOR ALL ENTRIES IN @LT_likp
            WHERE vbeln = @LT_likp-vbeln.

          IF sy-subrc = 0.
            SORT lt_lips BY vbeln posnr.
          ENDIF.
        ENDIF.
      ENDIF.
    ENDIF.

    "Generate attachments one by one for the selected FOs.
    LOOP AT it_key ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<ls_key>).

      "Prepare delivery table for the current FO.
      DATA(lt_delivery) = VALUE bapivbrk_t( FOR ls_del IN lt_delivery_all WHERE ( key = <ls_key>-key ) ( ordbilltyp = lc_ordbilltyp
                                                                                                         ref_doc_ca = lc_ref_doc_ca
           	                                                                                             ref_doc    = ls_del-ref_doc  ) ).
      "Stop GAI creation in case preceding docs have blocks.
      IF lt_delivery IS NOT INITIAL.
        LOOP AT lt_delivery ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<ls_delivery>).
          IF VALUE #( lt_likp[ vbeln = <ls_delivery>-ref_doc faksk = lc_x ]      OPTIONAL ) IS NOT INITIAL.
            DELETE lt_delivery WHERE ref_doc = <ls_delivery>-ref_doc.
          ELSEIF VALUE #( lt_likp[ vbeln =  <ls_delivery>-ref_doc lifsk = lc_x ] OPTIONAL ) IS NOT INITIAL.
            DELETE lt_delivery WHERE ref_doc = <ls_delivery>-ref_doc.
          ELSEIF VALUE #( lt_likp[ vbeln =  <ls_delivery>-ref_doc spstg = lc_x ] OPTIONAL ) IS NOT INITIAL.
            DELETE lt_delivery WHERE ref_doc = <ls_delivery>-ref_doc.
          ELSEIF VALUE #( lt_lips[ vbeln =  <ls_delivery>-ref_doc faksp = lc_x ] OPTIONAL ) IS NOT INITIAL.
            DELETE lt_delivery WHERE ref_doc = <ls_delivery>-ref_doc.
          ELSEIF VALUE #( lt_lips[ vgbel =  <ls_delivery>-ref_doc vgtyp = lc_c ] OPTIONAL ) IS NOT INITIAL.
            DELETE lt_delivery WHERE ref_doc = <ls_delivery>-ref_doc.
          ENDIF.
        ENDLOOP.
      ELSE.
        CONTINUE.
      ENDIF.

      "Create invoice.
      CALL FUNCTION 'BAPI_BILLINGDOC_CREATEMULTIPLE' DESTINATION lv_destination
        TABLES
          billingdatain = lt_delivery
          return        = lt_return
          success       = lt_success. "(Not optional!)

      CLEAR: lt_delivery.

      "Using the invoice number do the attachment.
      LOOP AT lt_return ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<ls_return>).

        IF <ls_return>-type NE if_cwd_constants=>c_message_success.
          MESSAGE ID <ls_return>-id TYPE <ls_return>-type NUMBER <ls_return>-number WITH <ls_return>-message_v1 <ls_return>-message_v2 INTO lv_dummy.
          /scmtms/cl_msg_helper=>msg_helper_add_symsg( CHANGING co_message = eo_message ).
          CONTINUE.
        ENDIF.

        "Wait up to 5 seconds until the billing document is ready.
        DO 5 TIMES.
          WAIT UP TO 1 SECONDS.

          cl_o2c_bil_services=>get_print_preview(
            EXPORTING
              iv_vbeln   = CONV #( <ls_return>-message_v1 )
              iv_kschl   = lc_kschl
            IMPORTING
              ev_pdf     =  lv_pdf
              es_message = DATA(ls_msg) ).

          IF lv_pdf IS NOT INITIAL.
            EXIT.
          ENDIF.
        ENDDO.

        IF lv_pdf IS INITIAL.
          MESSAGE ID ls_msg-msgid TYPE ls_msg-msgty NUMBER ls_msg-msgno WITH ls_msg-msgv1 ls_msg-msgv2 INTO lv_dummy.
          /scmtms/cl_msg_helper=>msg_helper_add_symsg( CHANGING co_message = eo_message ).
          CONTINUE.
        ENDIF.

        "Check if there is already an attachment.
        io_read->retrieve_by_association(
          EXPORTING
            iv_node        = /scmtms/if_tor_c=>sc_node-attachmentfolder
            it_key         = VALUE #( ( key = <ls_key>-key ) )
            iv_association = /scmtms/if_tor_c=>sc_association-root-attachmentfolder
          IMPORTING
            et_target_key  = DATA(lt_atf_key)  ).

        "If this is the first attachment, then first create an attachment node.
        IF lt_atf_key[] IS INITIAL.
          CREATE DATA lr_atf_root.
          lr_atf_root->key        = /bobf/cl_frw_factory=>get_new_key( ).
          lr_atf_root->parent_key = /scmtms/if_tor_c=>sc_node-root.
          ls_mod-change_mode      = /bobf/if_frw_c=>sc_modify_create.
          ls_mod-association      = /scmtms/if_tor_c=>sc_association-root-attachmentfolder.
          ls_mod-source_node      = /scmtms/if_tor_c=>sc_node-root.
          ls_mod-node             = /scmtms/if_tor_c=>sc_node-attachmentfolder.
          ls_mod-source_key       = <ls_key>-key.
          ls_mod-key              = lr_atf_root->key.
          ls_mod-data             = lr_atf_root.
          INSERT ls_mod INTO TABLE lt_mod.

          io_modify->do_modify( EXPORTING it_modification = lt_mod ).
          INSERT VALUE #( key = lr_atf_root->key ) INTO TABLE lt_atf_key.
        ENDIF.

        "Fill the parameter table
        CREATE DATA lr_action_par.
        GET REFERENCE OF ls_parameters INTO lr_action_par.
        ls_parameters-alternative_name          = lc_name_prefix && <ls_return>-message_v1.
        ls_parameters-content                   = lv_pdf.
        ls_parameters-file_name                 = lc_name_prefix && <ls_return>-message_v1.
        ls_parameters-mime_code                 = lc_mime_code.
        ls_parameters-name                      = lc_name_prefix && <ls_return>-message_v1.
        ls_parameters-description_language_code = sy-langu.
        ls_parameters-description               = lc_name_prefix && <ls_return>-message_v1.
        ls_parameters-description_content       = lc_name_prefix && <ls_return>-message_v1.
        ls_parameters-visibility_type           = abap_true.
        ls_parameters-attachment_type           = lc_att_type.
        ls_parameters-attachment_schema         = lc_att_schema.

        "Get action key for creating attachment.
        IF lv_action_key IS INITIAL.
          /scmtms/cl_common_helper=>get_do_keys_4_action(
            EXPORTING
              iv_host_bo_key      = /scmtms/if_tor_c=>sc_bo_key
              iv_host_do_node_key = /scmtms/if_tor_c=>sc_node-attachmentfolder
              iv_do_action_key    = /bobf/if_attachment_folder_c=>sc_action-root-create_file
            IMPORTING
              ev_action_key       = lv_action_key ).
        ENDIF.

        "Attach geberated PDF.
        io_modify->do_action(
          EXPORTING
            iv_act_key    = lv_action_key
            it_key        = lt_atf_key
            is_parameters = lr_action_par
          IMPORTING
            et_failed_key = DATA(lt_failed_key_atf) ).

        "Get tor id.
        DATA(lv_tor_id) = /scmtms/cl_tor_helper_root=>return_id_fortor_key( EXPORTING iv_tor_key = <ls_key>-key ).

        "Clear for the next round.
        CLEAR: ls_parameters, lt_atf_key, lr_action_par.
      ENDLOOP.
    ENDLOOP.
  ENDMETHOD.

 Here is the ATC message.

Regards

entry.title: CL_SALV_TABLE=>SET_SCREEN_STATUS is not using the correct GUI status
entry.content:
Hello,

I am using  CL_SALV_TABLE=>SET_SCREEN_STATUS with a custom GUI status to use a custom button.  I copied SALV_STANDARD, and when I test it, it looks like this with the Select All/Deselect All and other buttons:

When I run the program, it looks like this:

It shows correctly in System -> Status:

 

This is the code I have written:

  DATA: lo_columns   TYPE REF TO cl_salv_columns_list,
          lo_column    TYPE REF TO cl_salv_column_table,
          lo_cols      TYPE REF TO cl_salv_columns_table,
          lo_functions TYPE REF TO cl_salv_functions_list,
          lo_select    TYPE REF TO cl_salv_selections,
          l_info       TYPE string,
          l_icon       TYPE string.


    TRY.
        CALL METHOD cl_salv_table=>factory
          IMPORTING
            r_salv_table = gr_salv
          CHANGING
            t_table      = gt_mvt.

      CATCH cx_salv_msg .

    ENDTRY.

    gr_salv->set_screen_status(
            pfstatus      =  'ZSALV_STANDARD'
            report        =  'ZMMMVT_USC'
            set_functions = gr_salv->c_functions_all ).

    lo_cols = gr_salv->get_columns( ).
    lo_cols->set_optimize( 'X' ).

    TRY.
        lo_column ?= lo_cols->get_column('CHECK').
        lo_column->set_cell_type( if_salv_c_cell_type=>checkbox_hotspot ).
        lo_column->set_long_text( 'Checkbox' ).
      CATCH cx_salv_not_found.
    ENDTRY.


    lo_mvt->report_settings( ).

    DATA: lr_events TYPE REF TO cl_salv_events_table.

    lr_events = gr_salv->get_event( ).

    CREATE OBJECT gr_events.

    SET HANDLER gr_events->on_user_command FOR lr_events.
    SET HANDLER gr_events->on_link_click   FOR lr_events.

    gr_salv->display( ).

I have seen similar issues but haven't found a solution.  

There is a program that runs as soon as I execute the program called SAPLSDYNPRAL with Include LSDYNPRALU01 with Function HOOK_DYNP_RAL_PAI.  It runs every time we run a program but I'm not sure if it has anything to do with this issue.  

Any suggestions would be appreciated. 

Thanks!

entry.title: How to hide inactive plants from LOV in standard SAP tcodes like MB52?
entry.content:
Is there a way to hide inactive plants from the plant dropdown list (F4 help / LOV) in standard SAP transactions like MB51, COOIS, etc.?

We have several plants (e.g., MY21, MY22, SG11, SG12, SG13, SG14) that are no longer active, but they still appear in the plant selection list. This often causes users to mistakenly select inactive plants when running reports.

Is there a way to:

  • Mark these plants as inactive in configuration so they are excluded from the LOV?

  • Or restrict visibility based on user authorization or config?

We do not want to delete the plant master since historical data is still needed.

Appreciate any suggestions or best practices. Thanks in advance!

entry.title: Custom Fiori app displays placeholder instead of actual value from Odata
entry.content:
The app is connected to an odata service that gets data from vbak. I am trying to display the Sales Document Number 

CurrentExpected
Sales document no(header)Sales document no (header)
SalesDocument_01000000123
SalesDocument_01000000124
SalesDocument_01000000125

In my cds: it is declared that 

key vbak.vbeln  as SalesDocument

XML
<smartTable:SmartTable>
 <Table items="{Z_VBAKTEST}">
  <columns>
   <Column>
    <Text text="Sales Document No">
   <Column>
  </columns>
  <items>
   <ColumnListItem>
    <Text text="{SalesDocument}"/>
   <ColumnListItem>
  </items>
 </Table>
</smartTable:SmartTable>

entry.title: Check Field and Value Check foreign key table (dependent table)
entry.content:
I want to validate a row of data when uploading excel data to ALV. But I need to validate the data of the table ZTEST1111 below which contains DOCMT as the primary key and is checked table ZTEST111, in which ZTEST111 has 4 primary keys including MANDT, RBUKRS, BELNR, DOCLN. So I need to validate an

              IF ls_field_info-reftable IS NOT INITIAL
                AND ls_excel_line-value IS NOT INITIAL.

                DATA: lv_check_tab   TYPE tabname,
                      lv_excel_value TYPE string,
                      lt_pk_fields   TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF dfies,
                      ls_keyinfo     LIKE LINE OF lt_pk_fields,
                      lv_exists      TYPE abap_bool,
                      lv_where       TYPE string.

                CLEAR: lt_pk_fields, lv_exists.
                lv_check_tab = ls_field_info-reftable.
                lv_excel_value = condense( ls_excel_line-value ).

                "1. Get the list of fields that are the primary key of the table
                CALL FUNCTION 'DDIF_FIELDINFO_GET'
                  EXPORTING
                    tabname        = lv_check_tab
                    langu          = sy-langu
                    all_types      = abap_false
                  TABLES
                    dfies_tab      = lt_pk_fields
                  EXCEPTIONS
                    not_found      = 1
                    internal_error = 2
                    OTHERS         = 3.

                IF sy-subrc <> 0 OR lt_pk_fields IS INITIAL.
                  "Unable to get metadata => error
                  MESSAGE s025(zsap03_msg_cl) WITH lv_check_tab INTO lv_msg.
                  APPEND lv_msg TO lt_errors.
                  IF <lv_has_error> IS ASSIGNED.
                    <lv_has_error> = abap_true.
                  ENDIF.
                  lv_has_errors = abap_true.
                  CONTINUE.
                ENDIF.

                "2. Browse each field that is the primary key
                LOOP AT lt_pk_fields INTO ls_keyinfo WHERE keyflag = 'X'.

                  CLEAR: lv_exists, lv_where.

                  " WHERE: <primary_key_field> = value
                  CONCATENATE ls_keyinfo-fieldname '= _excel_value' INTO lv_where SEPARATED BY space.

                  TRY.
                      SELECT SINGLE 
                        FROM (lv_check_tab)
                        WHERE (lv_where)
                        INTO _exists.
                    CATCH cx_sy_dynamic_osql_semantics INTO DATA(lx_sql_error).
                      "If errors
                      MESSAGE lx_sql_error->get_text( ) TYPE 'S'.
                      MESSAGE s023(zsap03_msg_cl)
                        WITH ls_excel_line-row lv_excel_value lv_check_tab ls_keyinfo-fieldname
                        INTO lv_msg.
                      APPEND lv_msg TO lt_errors.
                      IF <lv_has_error> IS ASSIGNED.
                        <lv_has_error> = abap_true.
                      ENDIF.
                      lv_has_errors = abap_true.
                      CONTINUE.
                  ENDTRY.

                  IF lv_exists = abap_true.
                    "Assign a name to the found field
                    IF <lv_field> IS ASSIGNED.
                      <lv_field> = ls_keyinfo-fieldname.
                    ENDIF.
                    EXIT."If found, no need to check
                  ENDIF.

                ENDLOOP.

                "3. If not found in any PK field â†’ error
                IF lv_exists IS INITIAL.
                  MESSAGE e026(zsap03_msg_cl)
                    WITH ls_excel_line-row lv_excel_value lv_check_tab 'Primary Key fields'
                    INTO lv_msg.
                  APPEND lv_msg TO lt_errors.
                  IF <lv_has_error> IS ASSIGNED.
                    <lv_has_error> = abap_true.
                  ENDIF.
                  lv_has_errors = abap_true.
                  CONTINUE.
                ENDIF.
              ENDIF.

entire row of data when uploading. Can anyone help me?

entry.title: ABAP Question : Updating LFM1 on LFA1 in BP Tcode
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

How can I update LFM1 Fields based on the value in LFA1 Fields during save BP transaction ? Looking for a suitable BAdI or enhancement spot that allows this mapping safely.

Thanks in advance for your help!

entry.title: EF5008 No special G/L acct defined for acct type D sp.G/L ind. A recon.acct using BAPI_ACC_DOCUMENT
entry.content:
Good day 

I have an error that is troubling me, when I use my custom ABAP program to post a Special G/L Down payment(posting key 19 and 40) using BAPI_ACC_DOCUMENT it gives me the error below .

E F5 008 No special G/L acct defined for acct type D sp.G/L ind. A recon.acct

But when I post the same details using f-29 the transaction is posted without errors. I have gone over the configuration several times but all seems good.

I have attached my configuration as well.

regards

*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*& Report  ZTEST_AI_CODE2
*&
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*&
*&
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
REPORT ZTEST_AI_CODE2.

data: documentheader   type bapiache09,

      w_obj_type       type bapiache09-obj_type,
      w_obj_key        type bapiache09-obj_key,
      w_obj_sys        type bapiache09-obj_sys,

      w_logsys         type tbdls-logsys,
*"     VALUE(OBJ_TYPE) LIKE  BAPIACHE09-OBJ_TYPE
*"     VALUE(OBJ_KEY) LIKE  BAPIACHE09-OBJ_KEY
*"     VALUE(OBJ_SYS) LIKE  BAPIACHE09-OBJ_SYS

      e_accountgl      like bapiacgl09,
      t_accountgl      type standard table of bapiacgl09,
*"      ACCOUNTRECEIVABLE STRUCTURE  BAPIACAR09 OPTIONAL
      ls_accountpayable type bapiacap09,
      it_accountpayable type standard table of bapiacap09,
*"      ACCOUNTTAX STRUCTURE  BAPIACTX09 OPTIONAL
      it_accounttax type STANDARD TABLE OF BAPIACTX09,

      e_currencyamount type bapiaccr09,
      t_currencyamount type standard table of bapiaccr09,
*"      CRITERIA STRUCTURE  BAPIACKEC9 OPTIONAL
*"      VALUEFIELD STRUCTURE  BAPIACKEV9 OPTIONAL
*"      EXTENSION1 STRUCTURE  BAPIACEXTC OPTIONAL
      e_return         type bapiret2,
      t_return         type standard table of bapiret2,
      it_accountreceivable LIKE TABLE OF bapiacar09,
      ls_accountreceivable TYPE          bapiacar09.
*"      PAYMENTCARD STRUCTURE  BAPIACPC09 OPTIONAL
*"      CONTRACTITEM STRUCTURE  BAPIACCAIT OPTIONAL
*"      EXTENSION2 STRUCTURE  BAPIPAREX OPTIONAL
*"      REALESTATE STRUCTURE  BAPIACRE09 OPTIONAL
DATA: loc_amt              TYPE          wrbtr.
DATA: count type i.

data: itab like alsmex_tabline occurs 0 with header line.

TYPES: Begin of t_record,

    Doc_date like itab-value,
    Doc_type like itab-value,
    Company_code like itab-value,
    Posting_date like itab-value,
    Period like itab-value,
    Currency like itab-value,
    Posting_key like itab-value,
     Posting_key2 like itab-value,
    Account like itab-value,
    Amount like itab-value,
    Tax_code like itab-value,
    Doc_text like itab-value,
    Cost_centre like itab-value,
    End of t_record.


DATA: it_record type standard table of t_record initial size 0,
      wa_record type t_record.
DATA: gd_currentrow type i.



DATA: C_Doc_date like sy-datum,
      C_Posting_date like sy-datum,
      account_num(10) type c,
      cost_centre(10) type c,
      amt type p DECIMALS 2.

  call function 'OWN_LOGICAL_SYSTEM_GET'
    importing
      own_logical_system             = w_logsys
    exceptions
      own_logical_system_not_defined = 1
      others                         = 2.

  if sy-subrc ne 0.
    message id sy-msgid type sy-msgty number sy-msgno
           with sy-msgv1 sy-msgv2 sy-msgv3 sy-msgv4.
  endif.

  documentheader-username   = sy-uname.
  documentheader-header_txt = 'BELINAPOSTING'."'THIS IS THE HEADER TEXT'.

* Value field from T022 table, for BAPI, use 'RFBU'
  documentheader-bus_act    = 'RFBU'.

* Company Code
  documentheader-comp_code  = '1000'. "wa_ex-col3."9100.

* Document Date
  documentheader-doc_date   = '20250423'."'20200206'."wa_ex-col1."sy-datum.
* Posting Date
  documentheader-pstng_date = '20250423'."sy-datum."'20200206'."wa_ex-col4."sy-datum.
* Transaction Date (important when we have conversion rates)
  documentheader-trans_date = '20250423'.
* Document Type
  documentheader-doc_type   =  'DZ'."wa_ex-col2."'SA'.
""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""

"G/L
"Debit

wa_record-Posting_key = '40'.
"wa_record-Posting_key = '19'.
"""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""" posting the table transactions"""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""

"""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""CREDIT LEG 19"""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""
              ls_accountreceivable-customer  =   '0200000133'. " cust."'0000700397'.  200000133
              "*  ls_accountpayable-gl_account = '0000161000'.
              """""""""""ls_accountreceivable-gl_account = '0000142010'.
              ls_accountreceivable-comp_code = '1000'."gs_ZBELINA_sap-zcompcode.
              "*ls_accountreceivable-pmnttrms = '0001'.
              ls_accountreceivable-bline_date = '20250423'. "gs_ZBELINA_sap-baseline_date.
              "*ls_accountreceivable-pymt_meth = 'E'.
              "ls_accountreceivable-PYMT_CUR       = 'USD'.
            " ls_accountreceivable-sp_gl_ind = 'A'.

              "ls_accountpayable-tax_code  = 'A0'.

              ls_accountreceivable-item_text  = 'A/cc Receivable'. "gs_ZBELINA_sap-zdoc_text_ref."'BELINA Test A/P l item'.

               ls_accountreceivable-ITEMNO_ACC  = '002'. "gs_ZBELINA_sap-zdoc_text_ref."'BELINA Test A/P l item'.
               "#EC NOTEXT

               ls_accountreceivable-SP_GL_IND = 'A'.
              APPEND ls_accountreceivable TO it_accountreceivable.

              """ fill_currencyamount.

              CLEAR: loc_amt.

              CLEAR: e_currencyamount,loc_amt.
              "***  loc_amt = <lsy_output>-betrw.
              e_currencyamount-itemno_acc   = '002'. ""count.
              "ls_currencyamount-curr_type    = '00'.
              e_currencyamount-currency     = 'USD'."gs_ZBELINA_SAP-ZCURRENCY."'USD'.
              e_currencyamount-amt_doccur   = -110 . "'-2.00'. " amt  ."
              "***  ls_currencyamount-amt_base   =  '10.00'. "" loc_amt. ""( For  Debit / â€˜Sâ€™)

              APPEND e_currencyamount TO t_currencyamount.
"=======================================================================================================================================================


"==============================================Debit Leg 40====================================================================================================
"IF gs_ZBELINA-zpost_key EQ '40'.
          "iteeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee   40 oz"""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""
        "  count = count + 1.
          e_accountgl-itemno_acc      = '001'.   "count."1."rlv_counter.

          e_accountgl-comp_code       = '1000'.  "gs_ZBELINA-zcompcode."w_postings-company.

          e_accountgl-gl_account      = '0000113802'. "account_num."wa_record-Account."'0000403172'."w_postings-account.

          e_accountgl-pstng_date      = '20250423'   .  "gs_ZBELINA-zpost_date. " C_Posting_date."'20200206'."sy-datum."w_header-pstng_date.
          "e_accountgl-cs_trans_t      = "w_postings-ttype.

          e_accountgl-item_text       = 'A/c gl'.  "   gs_ZBELINA-zdoc_text_ref."'back 4 the 1st time'."w_postings-description.

           "e_accountgl-waers        = 'USD'.

         " e_accountgl-tax_code  = 'A0'.

          APPEND e_accountgl  TO t_accountgl.

          CLEAR e_accountgl.

          CLEAR: e_currencyamount,loc_amt.
              "***  loc_amt = <lsy_output>-betrw.
          e_currencyamount-itemno_acc   = '001'. ""count.
              "ls_currencyamount-curr_type    = '00'.
          e_currencyamount-currency     = 'USD'."gs_ZBELINA_SAP-ZCURRENCY."'USD'.

          e_currencyamount-amt_doccur   = '110' ."'2.00'. " amt * ( -1 ) ."
              "***  ls_currencyamount-amt_base   =  '10.00'. "" loc_amt. ""( For  Debit / â€˜Sâ€™)

          APPEND e_currencyamount TO t_currencyamount.




"ENDIF.






  CALL FUNCTION 'BAPI_ACC_DOCUMENT_POST'
**    destination dest
    EXPORTING
      documentheader = documentheader
***      customercpd       = gd_customercpd
***      contractheader    = gd_fica_hd
    TABLES
      accountgl      = t_accountgl
      accountreceivable = it_accountreceivable
      accountpayable = it_accountpayable
      accounttax     = it_accounttax
      currencyamount = t_currencyamount
   "  criteria       = it_criteria
   "  valuefield     = it_valuefield
   "  extension1     = it_ext
      return         = t_return.
  "paymentcard       = it_paymentcard
  " contractitem      = it_fica_it.
*      extension2        = it_ext2
*      realestate        = it_re.

**********************
* Calling UP BAPI FM *
**********************
*ENDLOOP.

*  call function 'BAPI_ACC_DOCUMENT_POST'
*    exporting
*      documentheader          = documentheader
**       CUSTOMERCPD             =
**       CONTRACTHEADER          =
*    importing
*      obj_type                = w_obj_type
*      obj_key                 = w_obj_key
*      obj_sys                 = w_obj_sys
*    tables
*      accountgl               = t_accountgl
*       ACCOUNTRECEIVABLE       = it_accountreceivable
*       ACCOUNTPAYABLE          = it_accountpayable
**       ACCOUNTTAX              =
*      currencyamount          = t_currencyamount
**       CRITERIA                =
**       VALUEFIELD              =
**       EXTENSION1              =
*      return                  = t_return
**       PAYMENTCARD             =
**       CONTRACTITEM            =
**       EXTENSION2              =
**       REALESTATE              =
*            .

  call function 'BAPI_TRANSACTION_COMMIT'
    exporting
      wait          = 'X'
*     IMPORTING
*       RETURN        =
            .

  loop at t_return into e_return.

    if  e_return-type   eq 'S'
    and e_return-id     eq 'RW'
    and e_return-number eq 605.

      write: /01 e_return-type,
              03 e_return-id,
              10 e_return-number,
              15 'Document Released ',
              40 w_obj_type, w_obj_key, w_obj_sys.

    else.

      write: /01 e_return-type,
              03 e_return-id,
              10 e_return-number,
              15 e_return-message.

    endif.

  endloop.
    "endif.

entry.title: Including @OData.publish:true on v4 OData service.
entry.content:
I have created 2 Odata services which I intend to use one on Fiori app, and the other one of non-sap middleware in which contains the following:

Data definition, Behaviour definition, Service binding, Service definition, Class. 

 

Do I still need to declare the annotation @odata.publish: true if the Local Service Endpoint of the Service Binding is already published?

entry.title: IW36: Copying Settlement Rules in the Child Order
entry.content:
Hi,

Is it possible in the IW36 transaction, when launched by a BDC (Batch Data Communication), to copy the settlement rules from the superior order into the child order at the point when the child order hasn't been created yet? This would be done from the IF_EX_WORKORDER_UPDATE~AT_SAVE method of the BADI.

Thank you.

entry.title: Accrual object creation --mass upload program
entry.content: I have developed an ABAP program to create accrual objects. The objects are visible in transaction ACACTREE02, but the Value field is empty. How can I make the values appear in ACACTREE02 after creating the objects?

entry.title: S4HANA CDS View I_BILLINGDOCUMENTITEMCUBE to use External system in Palantir
entry.content:
Hi SAP Team,

Kindly help us How Palantir team extract the ABAP CDS View from S4HANA system.

are there any properties like allow external system?

Is there any CDS View allow authorization set up.

Kindly help on the steps, how to approach in S4HANA CDS view I_BILLINGDOCUMENTITEMCUBE

Thanks

entry.title: Vendor Basic details are not showing in FBL1N (List Display) transaction
entry.content:
Hello, 

We have upgraded our SAP support package(ECC SP Level-0031) recently, After upgrade we are facing an issue in FBL1N transaction. 

Before upgrade in FBL1N transaction vendor Basic details like Vendor Account number, Company code, Name and city are showing on Top of vendor items as mentioned in screenshot (screenshot attached) whereas after upgrade vendor details are not showing (screenshot attached).

The issue is occurring only in LIST OUTPUT whereas in GRID OUTPUT it is working correctly. Someone please help to find the root cause (any configuration or development to be done).

entry.title: Upadating VBFA Entries
entry.content: I have some mismatched entries in VBFA table where I wanted to update RFMNG_FLO field based on RFMNG. What can be a better approach of doing it?

entry.title: How to determine the bopf action inside a badi implementation?
entry.content:
Hi everybody,
In our dev, we create the service PO based on the freight settlement document.
Inside, we have a badi implementation. We want this implementation to be executed only during this service PO creation.
In other words, if this badi is called during any other process we want it not to be executed.

In order to do this i need to get the bopf action key which i can see in callstack and use it as a filter for the execution of the badi via hardcoding. How can i get the action key here?

Regards
